text: Vedanā ca hidaṃ bhikkhave attā abhavissa nayidaṃ vedanā ābādhāya saṃvatteyya labbhetha ca vedanāya evaṃ me vedanā hotu evaṃ me vedanā mā ahosī ti
edit: Vedanā ca hidaṃ bhikkhave attā abhavissa nayidaṃ vedanā ābādhāya saṃvatteyya labbhetha ca vedanāya – evaṃ me vedanā hotu evaṃ me vedanā mā ahosī ti

translations.transtext: If this feeling, monks, was the self, this feeling would not exist for illness, and [you] might obtain the feeling thus, "May my feeling be in this way, may my feeling not have been in this way."
